title: Home and Away
itunes:title: Home and Away
description:
Bloomberg's Brexit Editor Edward Evans and Senior Executive Editor David Merritt speak to Bloomberg's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek, as Boris Johnson's plans run into trouble in Europe, and at home the so-called rebel alliance begins to fray. European Government Reporter Ian Wishart has the latest from Brussels. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
